00474 /**
00475  * @brief Helper function to switch off test modes.
00476  *
00477  * This function switches off a previously enabled test mode.
00478  * Note: Only one test mode at a time can be enabled.
00479  */
00480 /****************************************************************************/
00481 void TestmodeOff (void )
00482 /****************************************************************************/
00483 {
00484     switch (phyPIB.testmode)
00485     {
00486         case PHY_CONTINUOUS_MODE:   NTRXSetTestChirpMode (FALSE);
00487                                     break;
00488 
00489         case PHY_CARRIER_MODE:      NTRXSetTestCarrierMode (FALSE);
00490                                     break;
00491 
00492         default:                    break;
00493     }
00494 }
00495 
00496 /**
00497  * @brief Physical layer management entety
00498  * @param *msg this is the the message struct
00499  *
00500  * This function represents the service access point to configure the
00501  * physical layer. All configuration parameters are stored in the physical layer
00502  * parameter information base @em phyPIB. This function hides all necessarey steps
00503  * to enable or disable certain features. With this function it is possible to set values but
00504  * also to query the following settings:
00505  *
00506  * @ref PHY_CURRENT_CHANNEL : the channel is a transmission mode defined in PHY_TRX_MODE
00507  * @ref PHY_TRX_MODE : a set of three parameters bandwidth, symbol duration and symbol rate
00508  * @ref PHY_LOG_CHANNEL : is a predefined group of chip settings
00509  * @ref PHY_TX_POWER : output power setting [ 0 - 63 ]
00510  * @ref PHY_ARQ : hardware acknowledgement
00511  * @ref PHY_FEC : forward error correction
00512  * @ref PHY_MAC_ADDRESS1 : 1st MAC address for address matching
00513  * @ref PHY_MAC_ADDRESS2 : 2nd MAC address for address matching
00514  * @ref PHY_TX_ADDR_SELECT : select the MAC address as sender address
00515  * @ref PHY_ADDR_MATCHING : address matching or promiscuous mode
00516  * @ref PHY_PWR_DOWN_MODE : set operational mode
00517  * @ref PHY_RECALIBRATION : recalibration interval
00518  * @ref PHY_FRAME_TYPE : set frame types that will be handled by the nanoLOC chip
00519  */
00520 /****************************************************************************/
00521 void PLMESap (MsgT *msg)
00522 /****************************************************************************/
00523 {
00524     uint8_t bw = 0, sd = 0, br = 0, cf = 0, tuned = 0;
00525 
00526     /* if ntrx is in sleep mode, dont use ntrx */
00527     if (phyPIB.pwrDown == TRUE) return;
00528 
00529     switch (msg->prim)
00530     {
00531         case PLME_GET_REQUEST:  msg->prim = PLME_GET_CONFIRM;
00532                                 msg->status = PHY_SUCCESS;
00533                                 switch (msg->attribute)
00534                                 {
00535                                     case PHY_CURRENT_CHANNEL:       msg->value = phyPIB.currentChannel;
00536                                                                     break;
00537 
00538                                     case PHY_TRX_MODE:              msg->value = phyPIB.trxMode;
00539                                                                     break;
00540 
00541                                     case PHY_LOG_CHANNEL:           msg->value = phyPIB.logChannel;
00542                                                                     break;
00543 
00544                                     case PHY_TX_POWER:              msg->value = phyPIB.txPower;
00545                                                                     break;
00546 
00547                                     case PHY_ARQ:                   msg->value = phyPIB.arqMode;
00548                                                                     break;
00549 
00550                                     case PHY_ARQ_MAX:               msg->value = phyPIB.arqMax;
00551                                                                     break;
00552 
00553                                     case PHY_FEC:                   msg->value = phyPIB.fec;
00554                                                                     break;
00555 
00556                                     case PHY_MAC_ADDRESS1:          memcpy (msg->data, phyPIB.macAddr0, 6);
00557                                                                     break;
00558 
00559                                     case PHY_MAC_ADDRESS2:          memcpy (msg->data, phyPIB.macAddr0, 6);
00560                                                                     break;
00561 
00562                                     case PHY_TX_ADDR_SELECT:        msg->value = phyPIB.txAddrSel;
00563                                                                     break;
00564 
00565                                     case PHY_ADDR_MATCHING:         msg->value = phyPIB.addrMatch;
00566                                                                     break;
00567 
00568                                     case PHY_PWR_DOWN_MODE:         msg->value = phyPIB.pwrDownMode;
00569                                                                     break;
00570 
00571                                     case PHY_RECALIBRATION:         msg->value = (uint16_t)( phyPIB.lastRecalibration / 1000 );
00572                                                                     break;
00573 
00574                                     case PHY_RECAL_INTERVAL:        msg->value = (uint16_t)( phyPIB.recalInterval / 1000 );
00575                                                                     break;
00576 
00577                                     case PHY_FRAME_TYPE:            msg->value = phyPIB.frameType;
00578                                                                     break;
00579 
00580                                     case PHY_TESTMODE:              msg->value = phyPIB.testmode;
00581                                                                     break;
00582 
00583                                     case PHY_RX_STATE:              msg->value = phyPIB.rxState;
00584                                                                     break;
00585 
00586                                     case PHY_RSSI:                  msg->value = NTRXGetRssi();
00587                                                                     break;
00588 
00589                                     default:                        msg->status = PHY_UNSUPPORTED_ATTRIBUTE;
00590                                                                     break;
00591                                 }
00592                                 msg->pdu = msg->data;
00593                                 SendCfgUp (msg);
00594                                 break;
00595 
00596         case PLME_SET_REQUEST:  msg->prim = PLME_SET_CONFIRM;
00597                                 msg->status = PHY_SUCCESS;
00598                                 switch (msg->attribute)
00599                                 {
00600                                     case PHY_CCA_MODE:
00601                                                                     if (msg->value > 3)
00602                                                                     {
00603                                                                         msg->status = PHY_INVALID_PARAMETER;
00604                                                                         phyPIB.CAMode = PHY_CCA_OFF;
00605                                                                     }
00606                                                                     else
00607                                                                     {
00608                                                                         phyPIB.CAMode = (uint8_t)( msg->value );
00609                                                                     }
00610                                                                     break;
00611                                     case PHY_CURRENT_CHANNEL:       if (msg->value > 16)
00612                                                                     {
00613                                                                         msg->status = PHY_INVALID_PARAMETER;
00614                                                                     }
00615                                                                     else
00616                                                                     {
00617                                                                         phyPIB.currentChannel = (uint8_t)( msg->value );
00618                                                                         switch (phyPIB.currentChannel)
00619                                                                         {
00620                                                                             case 0: bw = NA_80MHz; sd = NA_1us; br = NA_1M_S;
00621                                                                                     break;
00622                                                                             default:bw = NA_22MHz; sd = NA_4us; br = NA_250k_S;
00623                                                                                     break;
00624                                                                         }
00625                                                                         NTRXSetChannel (phyPIB.currentChannel);
00626                                                                         NTRXSetupTrxMode (bw, sd, br);
00627                                                                     }
00628                                                                     break;
00629 
00630                                     case PHY_LOG_CHANNEL:           if (msg->value > CONFIG_MAX_LOG_CHANNEL - 1)
00631                                                                     {
00632                                                                         msg->status = PHY_INVALID_PARAMETER;
00633                                                                     }
00634                                                                     else
00635                                                                     {
00636                                                                         phyPIB.logChannel = (uint8_t)( msg->value );
00637                                                                         switch (phyPIB.logChannel)
00638                                                                         {
00639                                                                             case 1:  bw = NA_22MHz; sd = NA_4us; br = NA_250k_S;
00640                                                                                      cf = 1;
00641                                                                                      ntrxShadowReg[NA_UseFec_O] &= (uint8_t)( ~(1 << NA_UseFec_B ));
00642                                                                                      break;
00643 
00644                                                                             case 2:  bw = NA_22MHz; sd = NA_4us; br = NA_250k_S;
00645                                                                                      cf = 7;
00646                                                                                      ntrxShadowReg[NA_UseFec_O] &= (uint8_t)( ~(1 << NA_UseFec_B ));
00647                                                                                      break;
00648 
00649                                                                             case 3:  bw = NA_22MHz; sd = NA_4us; br = NA_250k_S;
00650                                                                                      cf = 13;
00651                                                                                      ntrxShadowReg[NA_UseFec_O] &= (uint8_t)( ~(1 << NA_UseFec_B ));
00652                                                                                      break;
00653 
00654                                                                             default: bw = NA_80MHz; sd = NA_1us; br = NA_1M_S;
00655                                                                                      cf = 0;
00656                                                                                      ntrxShadowReg[NA_UseFec_O] &= (uint8_t)( ~(1 << NA_UseFec_B ));
00657                                                                                      break;
00658                                                                         }
00659                                                                         NTRXSPIWriteByte (NA_UseFec_O, ntrxShadowReg[NA_UseFec_O]);
00660                                                                         NTRXSetChannel (cf);
00661                                                                         NTRXSetupTrxMode (bw, sd, br);
00662                                                                     }
00663                                                                     break;
00664 
00665                                     case PHY_TRX_MODE:
00666                                                                     phyPIB.trxMode = (uint8_t)( msg->value );
00667                                                                     switch (msg->value)
00668                                                                     {
00669 #                                                                       ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_500NS
00670                                                                         case 10:    bw = NA_80MHz; sd = NA_500ns; br = NA_125k_S; break;
00671                                                                         case 11:    bw = NA_80MHz; sd = NA_500ns; br = NA_1M_S; break;
00672                                                                         case 12:    bw = NA_80MHz; sd = NA_500ns; br = NA_2M_S; break;
00673 #                                                                       ifdef DEVKIT201_CHANGE
00674                                                                         case 13:    bw = NA_80MHz; sd = NA_500ns; br = NA_125k_S; tuned = 1; break;
00675                                                                         case 14:    bw = NA_80MHz; sd = NA_500ns; br = NA_1M_S; tuned = 1; break;
00676                                                                         case 15:    bw = NA_80MHz; sd = NA_500ns; br = NA_2M_S; tuned = 1; break;
00677 #                                                                       endif /* DEVKIT201_CHANGE */
00678 #                                                                       endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_500NS */
00679 
00680 #                                                                       ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_1000NS
00681                                                                         case 20:    bw = NA_80MHz; sd = NA_1us; br = NA_500k_S; break;
00682                                                                         case 21:    bw = NA_80MHz; sd = NA_1us; br = NA_1M_S; break;
00683 #                                                                       ifdef DEVKIT201_CHANGE
00684                                                                         case 22:    bw = NA_80MHz; sd = NA_1us; br = NA_500k_S; tuned = 1; break;
00685                                                                         case 23:    bw = NA_80MHz; sd = NA_1us; br = NA_1M_S; tuned = 1; break;
00686 #                                                                       endif /* DEVKIT201_CHANGE */
00687 #                                                                       endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_1000NS */
00688 
00689 #                                                                       ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_2000NS
00690                                                                         case 30:    bw = NA_80MHz; sd = NA_2us; br = NA_125k_S; break;
00691                                                                         case 31:    bw = NA_80MHz; sd = NA_2us; br = NA_250k_S; break;
00692                                                                         case 32:    bw = NA_80MHz; sd = NA_2us; br = NA_500k_S; break;
00693 #                                                                       ifdef DEVKIT201_CHANGE
00694                                                                         case 33:    bw = NA_80MHz; sd = NA_2us; br = NA_125k_S; tuned = 1; break;
00695                                                                         case 34:    bw = NA_80MHz; sd = NA_2us; br = NA_250k_S; tuned = 1; break;
00696                                                                         case 35:    bw = NA_80MHz; sd = NA_2us; br = NA_500k_S; tuned = 1; break;
00697 #                                                                       endif /* DEVKIT201_CHANGE */
00698 #                                                                       endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_2000NS */
00699 
00700 #                                                                       ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_4000NS
00701                                                                         case 40:    bw = NA_80MHz; sd = NA_4us; br = NA_125k_S; break;
00702                                                                         case 41:    bw = NA_80MHz; sd = NA_4us; br = NA_250k_S; break;
00703 #                                                                       endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_4000NS */
00704 
00705 #                                                                       ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_22MHZ_1000NS
00706                                                                         case 50:    bw = NA_22MHz; sd = NA_1us; br = NA_1M_S; break;
00707 #                                                                       endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_22MHZ_1000NS */
00708 
00709 #                                                                       ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_22MHZ_2000NS
00710                                                                         case 60:    bw = NA_22MHz; sd = NA_2us; br = NA_125k_S; break;
00711                                                                         case 61:    bw = NA_22MHz; sd = NA_2us; br = NA_250k_S; break;
00712                                                                         case 62:    bw = NA_22MHz; sd = NA_2us; br = NA_500k_S; break;
00713 #                                                                       endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_22MHZ_2000NS */
00714 
00715 #                                                                       ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_22MHZ_4000NS
00716                                                                         case 70:    bw = NA_22MHz; sd = NA_4us; br = NA_125k_S; break;
00717                                                                         case 71:    bw = NA_22MHz; sd = NA_4us; br = NA_250k_S; break;
00718 #                                                                       endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_22MHZ_4000NS */
00719                                                                         default:    DEBUG_PHY ("Valid modes: 10-43 (80Mhz) 50-84 (22Mhz) 90-93 (22HR)\n");
00720                                                                         msg->status = PHY_INVALID_PARAMETER;
00721                                                                         msg->pdu = msg->data;
00722                                                                         SendCfgUp (msg);
00723                                                                         return;
00724                                                                     }
00725 #                                                                   ifdef DEVKIT201_CHANGE
00726                                                                     if( bw == NA_80MHz )
00727                                                                     {
00728                                                                         if( tuned == 0 )
00729                                                                         {
00730                                                                             NTRXSetChannel ( 17 );
00731                                                                         }
00732                                                                         else
00733                                                                         {
00734                                                                             NTRXSetChannel ( 0 );
00735                                                                         }
00736                                                                     }
00737 #                                                                   endif
00738                                                                     NTRXSetupTrxMode (bw, sd, br);
00739 
00740                                                                     switch (bw)
00741                                                                     {
00742                                                                         case NA_80MHz: DEBUG_PHY ("New Mode 80 Mhz "); break;
00743                                                                         case NA_22MHz: DEBUG_PHY ("New Mode 22 Mhz "); break;
00744                                                                         default: DEBUG_PHY ("Unknown mode ??? ");
00745                                                                     }
00746                                                                     switch (sd)
00747                                                                     {
00748                                                                         case NA_500ns: DEBUG_PHY ("500 ns, "); break;
00749                                                                         case NA_1us:   DEBUG_PHY ("1 us, "); break;
00750                                                                         case NA_2us:   DEBUG_PHY ("2 us, "); break;
00751                                                                         case NA_4us:   DEBUG_PHY ("4 us, "); break;
00752                                                                         default: break;
00753                                                                     }
00754                                                                     switch (br)
00755                                                                     {
00756                                                                         case NA_125k_S: DEBUG_PHY ("125 kSym\n"); break;
00757                                                                         case NA_250k_S: DEBUG_PHY ("250 kSym\n"); break;
00758                                                                         case NA_500k_S: DEBUG_PHY ("500 kSym\n"); break;
00759                                                                         case NA_1M_S: DEBUG_PHY ("1 MSym\n"); break;
00760                                                                         case NA_2M_S: DEBUG_PHY ("2 MSym\n"); break;
00761                                                                         default: break;
00762                                                                     }
00763                                                                     break;
00764 
00765                                     case PHY_TX_POWER:              if (msg->value > 63)
00766                                                                     {
00767                                                                         msg->status = PHY_INVALID_PARAMETER;
00768                                                                     }
00769                                                                     else
00770                                                                     {
00771                                                                         phyPIB.txPower = (uint8_t)((msg->value) & 0x3f);
00772                                                                         ntrxShadowReg[NA_TxOutputPower0_O] &= (uint8_t)( ~(0x3f << NA_TxOutputPower0_LSB ));
00773                                                                         ntrxShadowReg[NA_TxOutputPower0_O] |= (uint8_t)( phyPIB.txPower << NA_TxOutputPower0_LSB);
00774                                                                         if (phyPIB.txPower != 0x3f)
00775                                                                         {   /* This way no table for the transmission output power is necessary */
00776                                                                             ntrxShadowReg[NA_TxOutputPower0_O] &= (uint8_t)( ~(1 << NA_TxOutputPower0_LSB ));
00777                                                                         }
00778                                                                         NTRXSPIWriteByte (NA_TxOutputPower0_O, ntrxShadowReg[NA_TxOutputPower0_O]);
00779 
00780                                                                         ntrxShadowReg[NA_TxOutputPower1_O] &= (uint8_t)( ~(0x3f << NA_TxOutputPower1_LSB ));
00781                                                                         ntrxShadowReg[NA_TxOutputPower1_O] |= (uint8_t)( (phyPIB.txPower << NA_TxOutputPower1_LSB ));
00782                                                                         if (phyPIB.txPower != 0x3f)
00783                                                                         {   /* This way no table for the transmission output power is necessary */
00784                                                                             ntrxShadowReg[NA_TxOutputPower1_O] &= (uint8_t)( ~(1 << NA_TxOutputPower1_LSB ));
00785                                                                         }
00786                                                                         NTRXSPIWriteByte (NA_TxOutputPower1_O, ntrxShadowReg[NA_TxOutputPower1_O]);
00787                                                                     }
00788                                                                     break;
00789 
00790                                     case PHY_ARQ:
00791                                                                     NTRXRXEnable(FALSE);
00792                                                                     if( msg->value == 0 )
00793                                                                     {
00794                                                                         ntrxShadowReg[NA_TxArq_O] &= (uint8_t)( ~(1 << NA_TxArq_B ));
00795                                                                         ntrxShadowReg[NA_RxArqMode_O] &= (uint8_t)( ~((0x03 << NA_RxArqMode_LSB )
00796                                                                                                         | (1 << NA_RxCrc2Mode_B )));
00797                                                                     }
00798                                                                     else
00799                                                                     {
00800                                                                         ntrxShadowReg[NA_TxArq_O] |= (1 << NA_TxArq_B);
00801                                                                         ntrxShadowReg[NA_RxArqMode_O] |= ((NA_RxArqModeCrc2_VC_C << NA_RxArqMode_LSB)
00802                                                                                                         | (NA_RxCrc2ModeTrigOn_BC_C << NA_RxCrc2Mode_B));
00803                                                                     }
00804                                                                     NTRXSPIWriteByte (NA_TxArq_O, ntrxShadowReg[NA_TxArq_O]);
00805                                                                     NTRXSPIWriteByte (NA_RxArqMode_O, ntrxShadowReg[NA_RxArqMode_O]);
00806                                                                     if (phyPIB.rxState == PHY_RX_ON)
00807                                                                     {
00808                                                                         NTRXRXEnable(TRUE);
00809                                                                     }
00810                                                                     break;
00811 
00812                                     case PHY_ARQ_MAX:               if (msg->value > 14)
00813                                                                     {
00814                                                                         msg->status = PHY_INVALID_PARAMETER;
00815                                                                     }
00816                                                                     else
00817                                                                     {
00818                                                                         NTRXRXEnable(FALSE);
00819                                                                         phyPIB.arqMax = (uint8_t)(msg->value);
00820                                                                         if (phyPIB.arqMax == 0)
00821                                                                         {
00822                                                                             ntrxShadowReg[NA_TxArqMax_O] &= (uint8_t)( ~( 0x0f << NA_TxArqMax_LSB ));
00823                                                                         }
00824                                                                         else
00825                                                                         {
00826                                                                             ntrxShadowReg[NA_TxArqMax_O] &= (uint8_t)( ~(0x0f << NA_TxArqMax_LSB ));
00827                                                                             ntrxShadowReg[NA_TxArqMax_O] |= ((uint8_t)(msg->value << NA_TxArqMax_LSB));
00828                                                                         }
00829                                                                         NTRXSPIWriteByte (NA_TxArqMax_O, ntrxShadowReg[NA_TxArqMax_O]);
00830                                                                         if (phyPIB.rxState == PHY_RX_ON)
00831                                                                         {
00832                                                                             NTRXRXEnable(TRUE);
00833                                                                         }
00834                                                                     }
00835                                                                     break;
00836 
00837                                     case PHY_FEC:
00838                                                                     NTRXRXEnable(FALSE);
00839                                                                     if (msg->value == TRUE)
00840                                                                     {
00841                                                                         ntrxShadowReg[NA_UseFec_O] |= (1 << NA_UseFec_B);
00842                                                                     }
00843                                                                     else
00844                                                                     {
00845                                                                         ntrxShadowReg[NA_UseFec_O] &= (uint8_t)( ~(1 << NA_UseFec_B));
00846                                                                     }
00847                                                                     NTRXSPIWriteByte (NA_UseFec_O, ntrxShadowReg[NA_UseFec_O]);
00848 
00849                                                                     phyPIB.fec = (uint8_t)( msg->value );
00850                                                                     modeSet.fec = (uint8_t)( msg->value );
00851 
00852                                                                     if (phyPIB.rxState == PHY_RX_ON)
00853                                                                     {
00854                                                                         NTRXRXEnable(TRUE);
00855                                                                     }
00856                                                                     break;
00857 
00858                                     case PHY_MAC_ADDRESS1:
00859                                                                     NTRXRXEnable(FALSE);
00860                                                                     memcpy (phyPIB.macAddr0, msg->data, 6);
00861                                                                     NTRXSetIndexReg (0);
00862                                                                     NTRXSPIWrite (NA_RamStaAddr0_O, msg->data , 6);
00863                                                                     if (phyPIB.rxState == PHY_RX_ON)
00864                                                                     {
00865                                                                         NTRXRXEnable(TRUE);
00866                                                                     }
00867                                                                     break;
00868 
00869                                     case PHY_MAC_ADDRESS2:
00870                                                                     NTRXRXEnable(FALSE);
00871                                                                     memcpy (phyPIB.macAddr1, msg->data, 6);
00872                                                                     NTRXSetIndexReg (0);
00873                                                                     NTRXSPIWrite (NA_RamStaAddr1_O, msg->data, 6);
00874                                                                     if (phyPIB.rxState == PHY_RX_ON)
00875                                                                     {
00876                                                                         NTRXRXEnable(TRUE);
00877                                                                     }
00878                                                                     break;
00879 
00880                                     case PHY_TX_ADDR_SELECT:
00881                                                                     NTRXRXEnable(FALSE);
00882                                                                     phyPIB.txAddrSel = (uint8_t)(msg->value);
00883                                                                     if (msg->value == 0)
00884                                                                     {
00885                                                                         ntrxShadowReg[NA_TxAddrSlct_O] &= (uint8_t)( ~(1 << NA_TxAddrSlct_B ));
00886                                                                     }
00887                                                                     else
00888                                                                     {
00889                                                                         ntrxShadowReg[NA_TxAddrSlct_O] |= (1 << NA_TxAddrSlct_B);
00890                                                                     }
00891                                                                     NTRXSPIWriteByte (NA_TxAddrSlct_O, ntrxShadowReg[NA_TxAddrSlct_O]);
00892                                                                     if (phyPIB.rxState == PHY_RX_ON)
00893                                                                     {
00894                                                                         NTRXRXEnable(TRUE);
00895                                                                     }
00896                                                                     break;
00897 
00898                                     case PHY_ADDR_MATCHING:
00899                                                                     NTRXRXEnable(FALSE);
00900                                                                     phyPIB.addrMatch = (uint8_t)(msg->value);
00901                                                                     if (msg->value == 0)
00902                                                                     {
00903                                                                         /* promiscuous mode */
00904                                                                         ntrxShadowReg[NA_RxAddrMode_O] &= (uint8_t)( ~( 1 << NA_RxAddrMode_B));
00905                                                                     }
00906                                                                     else
00907                                                                     {
00908                                                                         ntrxShadowReg[NA_RxAddrMode_O] |= (1 << NA_RxAddrMode_B);
00909                                                                     }
00910                                                                     NTRXSPIWriteByte (NA_RxAddrMode_O, ntrxShadowReg[NA_RxAddrMode_O]);
00911                                                                     if (phyPIB.rxState == PHY_RX_ON)
00912                                                                     {
00913                                                                         NTRXRXEnable(TRUE);
00914                                                                     }
00915                                                                     break;
00916 
00917                                     case PHY_RECALIBRATION:
00918                                                                     if (NTRXAllCalibration ())
00919                                                                     {
00920                                                                         phyPIB.lastRecalibration = hwclock();
00921                                                                         tiRecal = hwclock() + phyPIB.recalInterval;
00922                                                                         rcwd = 0;
00923                                                                         TRIGGER_LED_CAL();
00924                                                                     }else
00925                                                                     {
00926                                                                         msg->status = PHY_BUSY_RX;
00927                                                                     }
00928                                                                     break;
00929 
00930                                     case PHY_RECAL_INTERVAL:        /* delay time for recalibration */
00931                                                                     phyPIB.recalInterval = msg->value * 1000;
00932                                                                     break;
00933                                     case PHY_PWR_DOWN_MODE:         if (msg->value > 1)
00934                                                                     {
00935                                                                         msg->status = PHY_INVALID_PARAMETER;
00936                                                                     }
00937                                                                     else
00938                                                                     {
00939 
00940                                                                         DEBUG_PHY("PowerDown : %ld\n", *(uint32_t*)(msg->data));
00941                                                                         trxPollMode = (bool_t)((phyPIB.recalInterval == 0) ? FALSE : TRUE);
00942                                                                         phyPIB.pwrDownMode = (uint8_t)( msg->value );
00943                                                                         NTRXResetSettings ();
00944                                                                         NTRXPowerdownMode ((uint8_t)( msg->value ), *(uint32_t*)(msg->data));
00945                                                                         memset( cacheAddr, 0, 6 );
00946                                                                         phyPIB.pwrDown = TRUE;
00947                                                                     }
00948                                                                     break;
00949                                     case PHY_POWERDOWN_PAD_MODE:    if( msg->value == 0 )
00950                                                                     {
00951                                                                         NTRXPowerupFromPadMode();
00952                                                                         trxPollMode = TRUE;
00953                                                                         phyPIB.pwrUp = FALSE;
00954                                                                         phyPIB.pwrDown = FALSE;
00955                                                                         if (phyPIB.rxState == PHY_RX_ON)
00956                                                                         {
00957                                                                             NTRXRXEnable(TRUE);
00958                                                                         }
00959                                                                     }
00960                                                                     else
00961                                                                     {
00962                                                                         // do not poll nanoLOC while in sleep mode
00963                                                                         NTRXPowerdownModeDIO( 1, (uint8_t)( msg->value - 1 ));
00964                                                                         trxPollMode = FALSE;
00965                                                                         phyPIB.pwrDown = TRUE;
00966                                                                     }
00967                                                                     break;
00968 
00969                                     case PHY_FRAME_TYPE:            phyPIB.frameType = (uint8_t)( msg->value & 0x07 );
00970                                                                     ntrxShadowReg[NA_RxDataEn_O] = (uint8_t)( ~( 0x07 ));
00971                                                                     ntrxShadowReg[NA_RxDataEn_O] |= phyPIB.frameType;
00972                                                                     NTRXSPIWriteByte (NA_RxDataEn_O , ntrxShadowReg[NA_RxDataEn_O]);
00973                                                                     break;
00974 
00975                                     case PHY_TESTMODE:              if (msg->value > 2)
00976                                                                     {
00977                                                                         msg->status = PHY_INVALID_PARAMETER;
00978                                                                     }
00979                                                                     else
00980                                                                     {
00981                                                                         switch (msg->value)
00982                                                                         {
00983                                                                             case 1: TestmodeOff ();
00984                                                                                     NTRXSetTestChirpMode (TRUE);
00985                                                                                     /* this blocks the transmission path of the PDSap */
00986                                                                                     txSendMsg = &upMsg;
00987                                                                                     break;
00988 
00989                                                                              case 2: TestmodeOff ();
00990                                                                                     NTRXSetTestCarrierMode (TRUE);
00991                                                                                     /* this blocks the transmission path of the PDSap */
00992                                                                                     txSendMsg = &upMsg;
00993                                                                                     break;
00994 
00995                                                                             default:/* this enables the transmission path of the PDSap */
00996                                                                                     TestmodeOff ();
00997                                                                                     txSendMsg = NULL;
00998                                                                         }
00999 
01000                                                                         phyPIB.testmode = (uint8_t)( msg->value );
01001 
01002                                                                     }
01003                                                                     break;
01004 
01005                                     case PHY_RX_CMD:
01006                                                                     switch (msg->value)
01007                                                                     {
01008                                                                         case PHY_TRX_OFF:
01009                                                                         case PHY_RX_ON:
01010                                                                                             phyPIB.rxState = (uint8_t)( msg->value );
01011                                                                                             /*stop the receiver and clear the buffers */
01012                                                                                             NTRXRXEnable(FALSE);
01013                                                                                             /* clear interrupts */
01014                                                                                             NTRXSPIWriteByte (NA_RxIntsReset_O, 0x7F);
01015                                                                                             rxIrq = 0;
01016 #                                                                                           ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_SNIFFER
01017                                                                                             upMsg.count=0;
01018 #                                                                                           endif
01019                                                                                             if (msg->value == PHY_RX_ON)
01020                                                                                             {
01021                                                                                                 NTRXRXEnable(TRUE);
01022                                                                                             }
01023 
01024                                                                                             break;
01025 
01026                                                                         default:            msg->status = PHY_INVALID_PARAMETER;
01027                                                                                             break;
01028                                                                     }
01029                                                                     break;
01030 
01031                                     case PHY_RX_STATE:              switch (msg->value)
01032                                                                     {
01033                                                                         case PHY_RX_ON:
01034                                                                         case PHY_TRX_OFF:   phyPIB.rxState = (uint8_t)( msg->value );
01035                                                                                             break;
01036 
01037                                                                         default:            msg->status = PHY_INVALID_PARAMETER;
01038                                                                                             break;
01039                                                                     }
01040                                                                     break;
01041 
01042                                     case PHY_SYNCWORD:
01043 
01044                                                                     NTRXRXEnable(FALSE);
01045                                                                     memcpy (phyPIB.syncword, (uint8_t *)(msg->data), 8);
01046                                                                     NTRXSetSyncWord(phyPIB.syncword);
01047                                                                     if (phyPIB.rxState == PHY_RX_ON)
01048                                                                     {
01049                                                                         NTRXRXEnable(TRUE);
01050                                                                     }
01051                                                                     break;
01052 
01053                                     default:                        msg->status = PHY_UNSUPPORTED_ATTRIBUTE;
01054                                                                     break;
01055                                 }
01056                                 msg->pdu = msg->data;
01057                                 break;
01058 
01059         default:                break;
01060     }
01061     /* ieee config stuff */
01062 }
01063 
01064 /**
01065  * @brief Callback function for received messages
01066  *
01067  * This function reads out the payload of a received message and
01068  * calls the upper layer/application
01069  *
01070  */
01071 /****************************************************************************/
01072 void PDCallback (void)
01073 /****************************************************************************/
01074 {
01075     uint8_t       status;
01076     uint8_t       reg[2];
01077     uint8_t header_bits;
01078 
01079     /*
01080      * use 1 led to indicate message reception on the devBoard
01081      * The led will stay on for a 50 ms.
01082      */
01083 #   ifdef CONFIG_TRAFFIC_LED
01084     TRIGGER_LED_RX ();
01085 #   endif /* CONFIG_TRAFFIC_LED */
01086 
01087     /* on packet reception the rx is switched off automaticly from hardware */
01088     phyPIB.rxOn = FALSE;
01089 
01090     /*
01091      * read the crc2 status register
01092      */
01093     NTRXSPIReadByte (NA_RxCrc2Stat_O, &status);
01094     rxIrq = 0;
01095 
01096     /* check if data is valid */
01097     if ((status & (1 << NA_RxCrc2Stat_B)) != 0)
01098     {
01099         NTRXSetIndexReg (0);
01100         /* read source address */
01101         NTRXSPIRead (NA_RamRxSrcAddr_O, upMsg.addr, 6);
01102         /* read length plus additionl bits */
01103         NTRXSPIRead (NA_RamRxLength_O, reg, 2);
01104 
01105         header_bits = (uint8_t)( reg[1] >> 5 );
01106 
01107         /* read destination address */
01108 #       ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_SNIFFER
01109         NTRXSPIRead (NA_RamRxDstAddr_O, upMsg.rxAddr, 6);
01110         upMsg.count++;
01111         upMsg.extBits = header_bits;
01112         upMsg.frameType = (status & 0x0f);
01113 #       endif
01114 
01115         upMsg.len = reg[0];
01116         if (upMsg.len > CONFIG_MAX_PACKET_SIZE)
01117         {
01118             /* restart receiver */
01119             if (phyPIB.rxState == PHY_RX_ON)
01120             {
01121                 NTRXRXEnable(TRUE);
01122             }
01123         }
01124         else
01125         {
01126 
01127             if (buffSwapped == TRUE)
01128             {
01129                 buffSwapped = FALSE;
01130                 /* SWAP BUFFER for receive*/
01131                 ntrxShadowReg[NA_SwapBbBuffers_O] &= (uint8_t)( ~(1 << NA_SwapBbBuffers_B ));
01132                 NTRXSPIWriteByte (NA_SwapBbBuffers_O, ntrxShadowReg[NA_SwapBbBuffers_O]);
01133 
01134                 NTRXSetIndexReg (3);
01135             }
01136             else
01137             {
01138                 buffSwapped = TRUE;
01139                 /* SWAP BUFFER for receive*/
01140                 ntrxShadowReg[NA_SwapBbBuffers_O] |= (1 << NA_SwapBbBuffers_B);
01141                 NTRXSPIWriteByte (NA_SwapBbBuffers_O, ntrxShadowReg[NA_SwapBbBuffers_O]);
01142 
01143                 NTRXSetIndexReg (2);
01144             }
01145 
01146             tiPhyRxTimeout_once = FALSE;
01147             tiPhyRxTimeout = hwclock() + phyPIB.phyRxTimeout;
01148 
01149             /*
01150              * restart receiver and than read rx buffer. This is ok because we use
01151              * buffer swapping.
01152              */
01153             if (phyPIB.rxState == PHY_RX_ON)
01154             {
01155                 NTRXRXEnable(TRUE);
01156             }
01157 
01158             NTRXSPIRead ((uint8_t)(NA_RamRxBuffer_O & 0xFF), upMsg.data, upMsg.len);
01159             NTRXSetIndexReg (0);
01160 
01161 #           ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_SNIFFER
01162             upMsg.value = 0xff;
01163             upMsg.prim = PD_DATA_INDICATION;
01164             upMsg.pdu = upMsg.data;
01165             SendMsgUp (&upMsg);
01166 #           else
01167 
01168             /*
01169              * if address matching off, ignore rangingstates
01170              * this path is used for normal data reception
01171              * ranging is handled in the else path
01172              */
01173             if (((ntrxShadowReg[NA_RxAddrMode_O] & (1<<NA_RxAddrMode_B)) == 0) || (header_bits == MSG_TYPE_DATA))
01174             {
01175                 upMsg.value = 0xff;
01176                 upMsg.prim = PD_DATA_INDICATION;
01177                 upMsg.pdu = upMsg.data;
01178                 SendMsgUp (&upMsg);
01179             }else if (header_bits == MSG_TYPE_RANGING)
01180             {
01181                 NTRXRangingRX(&upMsg);
01182             }
01183 #           endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_SNIFFER */
01184         }
01185     }else
01186     {
01187         /* restart receiver */
01188         if (phyPIB.rxState == PHY_RX_ON)
01189         {
01190             NTRXRXEnable(TRUE);
01191         }
01192     }
01193 }
01194 
01195 /**
01196  * @brief polls the nanoLOC chip for incomming messages
01197  *
01198  * This function is the main part of the the physical layer. It processes
01199  * all interrupt flags and supervises the periodic recalibration.
01200  *
01201  */
01202 /***************************************************************************/
01203 void PHYPoll (void)
01204 /***************************************************************************/
01205 {
01206     uint8_t arqCount;
01207     MsgT *tMsg;
01208 
01209     /* if ntrx is in sleep mode, dont use ntrx */
01210     if (phyPIB.pwrDown == TRUE) return;
01211 
01212     if ((phyPIB.CAMode != PHY_CCA_OFF) && (ntrxState == TxSEND) && (hwclock() > phyPIB.titxstart + TO_CSMA))
01213     {
01214         DEBUG_PHY("CSMA Timeout\n");
01215 
01216         /* cancel transmission */
01217         NTRXSPIWriteByte (NA_TxBufferCmd_O, (1 << NA_TxCmdStop_B));
01218 
01219         /* disable csma/cca */
01220         ntrxShadowReg[NA_TxPhCarrSenseMode_O] &= (uint8_t)( ~(0x03 << NA_TxPhCarrSenseMode_LSB ));
01221         NTRXSPIWriteByte (NA_TxPhCarrSenseMode_O, ntrxShadowReg[NA_TxPhCarrSenseMode_O]);
01222 
01223         /* mark buffers as valid and start transmission again */
01224         NTRXSPIWriteByte (NA_TxBufferCmd_O, (1 << NA_TxCmdStart_B) | (0x03 << NA_TxBufferCmd_LSB));
01225     }
01226 
01227 #   ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_IRQ
01228     cli();
01229     nnIrq = 0;
01230     sei();
01231 #   endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_IRQ */
01232 
01233     if (tiPhyRxTimeout < hwclock() && tiPhyRxTimeout_once == FALSE)
01234     {
01235         tiPhyRxTimeout_once = TRUE;
01236 
01237         upMsg.prim = PD_STATUS_INDICATION;
01238         upMsg.attribute = PHY_RX_TIMEOUT;
01239         upMsg.pdu = upMsg.data;
01240         SendMsgUp (&upMsg);
01241     }
01242 
01243 #   ifndef CONFIG_NTRX_IRQ
01244     if (trxPollMode == TRUE)
01245     {
01246         NTRXInterrupt ();
01247     }
01248     UpdateLEDs ();
01249 #   endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_IRQ */
01250 
01251     if (ntrxState == TxWAIT)
01252         {
01253             /*
01254             * get number of transmissions needed to last message
01255             * This information is used to determine if the last
01256             * transmission was successfull or failed.
01257             */
01258             NTRXSPIReadByte (NA_TxArqCnt_O, &arqCount);
01259             arqCount &= 0x0F;
01260 
01261             if (arqCount > phyPIB.arqMax)
01262             {
01263 
01264 #               ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_AUTO_RECALIB
01265                 if(( ++rcwd > 3 ) && ( phyPIB.recalInterval != 0 ))
01266                 {
01267                     /* INFO: If the TRX sends a packet, calibration failes!
01268                     * In this case rcwd is not reset, but tiRecal is.
01269                     */
01270                     /* normal operation mode */
01271                     if (phyPIB.testmode == 0)
01272                     {
01273                         if (NTRXAllCalibration ())
01274                         {
01275                             tiRecal = hwclock() + phyPIB.recalInterval;
01276                             rcwd = 0;
01277                             TRIGGER_LED_CAL();
01278                         }
01279                     }
01280                     else
01281                     {
01282                         /*
01283                         * in case of an enabled testmode recalibration is a bit trickier.
01284                         * We first have to disable the testmode, recalibrate and then
01285                         * enable the testmode again.
01286                         */
01287 
01288                         if (phyPIB.testmode == 1)
01289                         {
01290                             NTRXSetTestChirpMode (FALSE);
01291                             NTRXAllCalibration ();
01292                             TRIGGER_LED_CAL();
01293                             NTRXSetTestChirpMode (TRUE);
01294                         }
01295                         else
01296                         {
01297                             NTRXSetTestCarrierMode  (FALSE);
01298                             NTRXAllCalibration ();
01299                             TRIGGER_LED_CAL();
01300                             NTRXSetTestCarrierMode  (TRUE);
01301                         }
01302                     }
01303                 }
01304 #               endif
01305 
01306                 TRIGGER_LED_ERR();
01307                 txSendMsg->status = PHY_NO_ACK;
01308             }
01309             else
01310             {
01311                 txSendMsg->status = PHY_SUCCESS;
01312             }
01313 
01314             txIrq &= (uint8_t)( ~(0x01 << NA_TxEnd_B ));
01315             ntrxState = TxIDLE;
01316             txSendMsg->value = arqCount;
01317 
01318             if ( phyPIB.frameType != last_frameType )
01319             {
01320                 phyPIB.frameType = last_frameType;
01321                 ntrxShadowReg[NA_TxPacketType_O] &= (uint8_t)( ~( 0x0F ));
01322                 ntrxShadowReg[NA_TxPacketType_O] |= phyPIB.frameType;
01323                 NTRXSPIWriteByte (NA_TxPacketType_O , ntrxShadowReg[NA_TxPacketType_O]);
01324 
01325                 DEBUG_PHY("frame type restore\n");
01326 
01327                 ntrxShadowReg[NA_TxArq_O] |= (1 << NA_TxArq_B);
01328                 NTRXSPIWriteByte (NA_TxArq_O, ntrxShadowReg[NA_TxArq_O]);
01329             }
01330 
01331             switch (txSendMsg->prim)
01332             {
01333                 case PD_RANGING_REQUEST:
01334                     NTRXRangingACK();
01335 
01336                     break;
01337                 default:
01338                     txSendMsg->prim = PD_DATA_CONFIRM;
01339 
01340                     tMsg = txSendMsg;
01341                     txSendMsg = NULL;
01342                     tMsg->pdu = tMsg->data;
01343                     SendMsgUp (tMsg);
01344                     break;
01345             }
01346 
01347 
01348 
01349     }
01350 
01351     /* check if nanoNET TRX chip has received valid data */
01352     if (ntrxState == TxIDLE)
01353     {
01354         if ((rxIrq & (0x01 << NA_RxEnd_B)) != 0 )
01355         {
01356 #           ifdef CONFIG_DEFAULT_TRX_80MHZ_4000NS
01357             HWDelayus(300); /* make sure that hwack is transmitted before PDCallback */
01358 #           endif
01359             PDCallback ();
01360         }
01361     }
01362 
01363 #   ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_AUTO_RECALIB
01364     if (phyPIB.recalInterval != 0)
01365     {
01366         if ((rcwd > 3) || (tiRecal < hwclock()))
01367         {
01368             /* INFO: If the TRX sends a packet, calibration failes!
01369              * In this case rcwd is not reset, but tiRecal is. */
01370             if (phyPIB.testmode == 0)
01371             {
01372                 if (NTRXAllCalibration ())
01373                 {
01374                     tiRecal = hwclock() + phyPIB.recalInterval;
01375                     rcwd = 0;
01376                     TRIGGER_LED_CAL();
01377                 }
01378             }
01379             else
01380             {
01381                 /*
01382                     * in case of an enabled testmode recalibration is a bit trickier.
01383                     * We first have to disable the testmode, recalibrate and then
01384                     * enable the testmode again.
01385                     */
01386                 if (phyPIB.testmode == 1)
01387                 {
01388                     NTRXSetTestChirpMode (FALSE);
01389                     NTRXAllCalibration ();
01390                     TRIGGER_LED_CAL();
01391                     NTRXSetTestChirpMode (TRUE);
01392                 }
01393                 else
01394                 {
01395                     NTRXSetTestCarrierMode  (FALSE);
01396                     NTRXAllCalibration ();
01397                     TRIGGER_LED_CAL();
01398                     NTRXSetTestCarrierMode  (TRUE);
01399                 }
01400             }
01401         }
01402     }
01403 #   endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_AUTO_RECALIB */
01404 }
01405 
01406 /**
01407  * @brief interrupt service routine for the nanoLOC chip
01408  *
01409  * This function is an interrupt service routine of the nanochip.
01410  * It updates the TX and RX status flags.
01411  *
01412  */
01413 /**************************************************************************/
01414 void NTRXInterrupt (void)
01415 /**************************************************************************/
01416 {
01417     /* if ntrx is in sleep mode, dont use ntrx */
01418     if (phyPIB.pwrDown == TRUE) return;
01419 
01420     /* we have received an interrupt and neede to find out what caused it */
01421     NTRXSPIRead (NA_TxIntsRawStat_O, ntrxIrqStatus, 2);
01422 
01423     /* check if it was the transmitter */
01424     if (txIrqStatus != 0)
01425     {
01426         /* clear interrupts */
01427         NTRXSPIWriteByte (NA_TxIntsReset_O, txIrqStatus);
01428         txIrq |= (uint8_t)( txIrqStatus & (0x01 << NA_TxEnd_B));
01429         if ((txIrq & (0x01 << NA_TxEnd_B)) != 0)
01430         {
01431             ntrxState = TxWAIT;
01432 #           ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_IRQ
01433             nnIrq = 1;
01434 #           endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_IRQ */
01435         }
01436     }
01437     /* check if it was the receiver */
01438     if (rxIrqStatus != 0)
01439     {
01440         /* clear interrupts */
01441         NTRXSPIWriteByte (NA_RxIntsReset_O, rxIrqStatus);
01442         rxIrq |= (uint8_t)( rxIrqStatus & (0x01 << NA_RxEnd_B));
01443 #       ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_IRQ
01444         nnIrq = 1;
01445 #       endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_IRQ */
01446     }
01447     //BASEBAND
01448     NTRXSPIRead(NA_BbTimerIrqStatus_O,&ntrxBBStatus,1);
01449     /* check if it was the basebandtimer */
01450     if ((ntrxBBStatus & 0x40) != 0)
01451     {
01452         NTRXStopBbTimer();
01453 
01454         NTRXRangingInterrupt();
01455 
01456         ntrxBBStatus = 0;
01457     }
01458 }
01459 
01460 /**************************************************************************/
01461 /**
01462  * @brief Configuration of callback functions.
01463  * @param cbMsg Callback function pointer for the (protocol) message interface.
01464  * If not set the PHY will call the function @ref APLCallback by default.
01465  */
01466 void PHYRegisterCallback(callbackfn_t cbMsg)
01467 {
01468     if (cbMsg == NULL)
01469     {
01470         phySendMsgUp = &APLCallback;
01471     }
01472     else
01473     {
01474         phySendMsgUp = cbMsg;
01475     }
01476 }
01477 
01478 /**************************************************************************/
01479 /**
01480  * @brief Returns status of PHY and RANGING.
01481  * @return TRUE if phy and ranging in status IDLE.
01482  * Used to check the status of the driver before going power down.
01483  */
01484 bool_t PHYIsIDLE(void)
01485 {
01486     if ((ntrxState == TxIDLE) && (NTRXRangingIsIDLE())) return TRUE;
01487 
01488     return FALSE;
01489 }
01490 
01491 #ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_AUTO_RECALIB
01492 /**************************************************************************/
01493 void PHYAutoCalibration( void )
01494 /**************************************************************************/
01495 {
01496     if (phyPIB.recalInterval != 0)
01497     {
01498         if (tiRecal < hwclock())
01499         {
01500             /* INFO: If the TRX sends a packet, calibration failes!
01501              * In this case rcwd is not reset, but tiRecal is. */
01502             if (phyPIB.testmode == 0)
01503             {
01504                 if (NTRXAllCalibration ())
01505                 {
01506                     tiRecal = hwclock() + phyPIB.recalInterval;
01507                     rcwd = 0;
01508                     TRIGGER_LED_CAL();
01509                 }
01510             }
01511             else
01512             {
01513                 /*
01514                     * in case of an enabled testmode recalibration is a bit trickier.
01515                     * We first have to disable the testmode, recalibrate and then
01516                     * enable the testmode again.
01517                     */
01518                 if (phyPIB.testmode == 1)
01519                 {
01520                     NTRXSetTestChirpMode (FALSE);
01521                     NTRXAllCalibration ();
01522                     TRIGGER_LED_CAL();
01523                     NTRXSetTestChirpMode (TRUE);
01524                 }
01525                 else
01526                 {
01527                     NTRXSetTestCarrierMode  (FALSE);
01528                     NTRXAllCalibration ();
01529                     TRIGGER_LED_CAL();
01530                     NTRXSetTestCarrierMode  (TRUE);
01531                 }
01532             }
01533         }
01534     }
01535 }
01536 #endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_AUTO_RECALIB */
